attributes.additional_details:
We are based in the heart of Woolwich town centre close by the DLR providing service to 19000 patients.
Our petition is currently supported by several members of the local Council however we need  the support from the public in this matter.
attributes.background: Due to a recent redevelopment in the Spray Street quarter, we have to relocate our surgery. However, the lack of support from council is making it hard to relocate in Woolwich. A petition set up so that we can prove to the council that moving out of Woolwich is not beneficial to us or our patients.

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be about a decision that's the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

http://www.royalgreenwich.gov.uk/info/200033/councillors_democracy_and_elections/1789/petitions_to_the_royal_borough_of_greenwich
